findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of sundae tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected approval in approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to approve tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer in transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function allows an attacker to drain the contract's balance by repeatedly calling it.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to withdraw tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance in increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have any protection or validation, which can lead to unauthorized allowance increases.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance in decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have any protection mechanism to prevent unauthorized allowance decreases.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer in _transfer function
findings.description: The internal _transfer function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint in _mint function
findings.description: _mint function lacks access control, allowing anyone to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn in _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected and can be accessed internally without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve in _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially leading to unauthorized approval of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected permit in permit function
findings.description: The permit function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint in mint function
findings.description: The mint function allows anyone to mint new tokens without any restrictions or authentication checks.

findings.title: Unprotected burn in burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any protection mechanism to prevent unintended burning of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap in swap function
findings.description: The swap function does not properly validate or handle the swap operation, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.
findings.function: swapAndSendToFee() or swapAndLiquify() or swapTokensForEth() or swapTokensForCake()

findings.title: Unprotected skim in skim function
findings.description: The skim function does not have any protection mechanism to prevent unauthorized access or manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected sync in sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have proper synchronization protection, which can lead to unexpected behavior or data inconsistencies.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize in initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.
